name: One Final Chaos - Demo
description:
Controls:

Z: Change direction (also possible while in air)

X: Boost (you can boost three times before landing)

Check out the demo for One Final Chaos - a new type of endless runner! Jumping and changing direction – those are the only things you need to learn. But to survive in this chaotic space, timing and precision makes all the difference. Watch out for deadly energy beams and time your next jump to survive and venture further into the chaos!

This demo contains only one game mode (Medium) and no options. The full game contains over 15 game modes - and much more! Check out our Steam Greenlight for more info:

http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=515199406
